name: Serene Coastal Retreat
description: Unwind at a tranquil coastal retreat with stunning sea views and peaceful ambiance.
Day1: Arrival and beachside dinner; sunset stroll along the coast.
Day2: Boat tour to nearby islands; seafood feast at a local restaurant.
Day3: Relaxing spa day and leisure time; departure.

name: Rustic Vineyard Escape
description: Experience the charm of rural vineyards with wine tastings and scenic views.
Day1: Arrival and wine tasting; dinner with vineyard views.
Day2: Tour of the vineyard and wine production process; picnic lunch.
Day3: Cooking class with local cuisine; evening wine tasting.

name: Tropical Island Adventure
description: Explore a lush tropical island with thrilling outdoor adventures and relaxing beaches.
Day1: Arrival and beachfront dinner; evening island tour.
Day2: Snorkeling and scuba diving; cultural dance performance.
Day3: Hiking through tropical forests; spa treatment.
Day4: Visit to local temples; sunset cruise.

name: Historic European Journey
description: Step back in time and explore the rich history and architecture of Europe.
Day1: Arrival and check-in; evening cruise on the Seine River.
Day2: Explore the Louvre and Notre Dame; dinner in Montmartre.
Day3: Visit Versailles Palace and gardens; evening at the Eiffel Tower.
Day4: Tour of the Latin Quarter and Sorbonne; shopping on Champs-Élysées.
Day5: Day trip to Normandy; return to Paris.
